description:
As part of their training to become the Platinum Princess each of the students must take up a part time job so that they can interact with people they typically would not run into in their everyday lives. As their first assignment Yucie, Cocoloo and Glenda take up helper positions at a nearby confectionary shop. What will happen when all three girls end up working together!?
Source: tv.com

titles.title: ドキドキ! 初めてのアルバイト!
